4314090.name: Azimuth
4314090.description:
BUILD THE IMPOSSIBLE

Azimuth is a sci-fi idle incremental game where you are the architect of the galaxy's most ambitious industrial project. Starting with a single drone on a rocky ruined world, you will expand across star systems, harvest exotic matter, and construct colossal megastructures that defy the laws of physics.

UNIQUE MECHANICS

  • Each planet is unique, with its own buildings and resources. Harvest magma from a volcanic hellscape, condense deuterium from a gas giant, and extract dark matter from the edge of a black hole.

  • Design your own production builds using a grid-based module system. Arrange amplifiers, producers, and consumption-reducers to create the perfect engine of efficiency.

  • Construct many different types of buildings and megastructures. Using detailed hand-drawn and 3D-rendered pixel art, watch as they visually evolve from basic frames to star-encompassing marvels.

  • Multiple different unlockable mechanics ensure that both active and idle play-styles are viable. Use the kinetic battery to supercharge your building construction with the power of your manual clicks, or automate with advanced paradigm tech and countergains.

  • Prestige mechanics allow you to reset the universe to increase production. Spend your helix points on a massive branching tree that permanently alters the rules of your game.

EXPLORE THE COSMOS, AT YOUR OWN PACE

Your journey will take you through many distinct star systems, each with their own visual style and resources. Immerse yourself in a UI inspired by 80s sci-fi terminals and CRT monitors, combining satisfying tactile interface design with modern idle mechanics.

Optimize, explore, and unlock the secrets of the universe.
